venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Attendees will experience the simple process of
'Mindfulness Meditation'.

While concentration involves a practitioner
focusing her attention on a single object,
in Mindfulness Meditation practice,
every aspect of experience is welcomed.


In tonight's session, attendees will learn the exquisite
joy of appreciating and welcoming 'insight' as to
the true nature of their reality.


Attendance is by donation, with all proceeds going to
Our Weeping Angel Foundation.

Suggested donation is $10.00.

Our Weeping Angel Foundation helps people to heal from
illness, pain, addiction, depression, grief, stress and
fear and return to the joy of living through alternative
healing, holistic medicine and spiritual counseling.

Pre-registration is required, as space is limited.

To register or for further information about this event,
contact Kathryn at the number above.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: An Evening of Mindfulness Meditation
